name: mwx1
description:
1/10
4950x4950
2021



‘Automatic’ experiments in colour and light.

I often sense a light source in my work that almost seems to cast a shadow. It’s quite unintentional. 

With these experiments I decided to prioritise this light source, directing the creative process toward something more sculptural and less flat. 

By seeing where subsequent ‘shadows’ fell I was able to give shape to the form that was being suggested. 

I love how surprising these pieces are. I find these abstract shapes really interesting and pleasurable so I thought I’d share them. 

I’ve used a flat colour ground as it suggests a quote from Yves Klein ‘I have come to believe that there is a living world of each colour…’

The combination of individual light source and colour, for me, suggest a space other than the one we inhabit physically.
